name: Accumulated write-off derivation rule
description: This derivation rule aims to obtain the Accumulated write-off from its building blocks.
algorithm:
SET ACCMLTD_TTL_WRTFFS = 
      CASE
        WHEN GRSS_CRRYNG_AMNT = 0 AND CRRYNG_AMNT = 0 THEN ACCMLTD_WRTFFS
        ELSE N/A
      END;

    SET ACCMLTD_PRTL_WRTFFS = 
      CASE
        WHEN CRRYNG_AMNT <> 0 THEN ACCMLTD_WRTFFS
        ELSE N/A
      END;

logical_transformation_rule.algorithm:
SET BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_EIL.ACCMLTD_PRTL_WRTFFS = 
      CASE
        WHEN BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_IL.CRRYNG_AMNT <> 0 THEN BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_IL.ACCMLTD_WRTFFS
        ELSE N/A
      END;

SET BIRD_LNG_SCRTY_PSTN_PRDNTL_PRTFL_ASSGNMNT_ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN_FNNCL_ASSTS_ASSGNMNT_EIL.ACCMLTD_PRTL_WRTFFS = 
      CASE
        WHEN BIRD_LNG_SCRTY_PSTN_PRDNTL_PRTFL_ASSGNMNT_ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN_FNNCL_ASSTS_ASSGNMNT_IL.CRRYNG_AMNT <> 0 THEN BIRD_LNG_SCRTY_PSTN_PRDNTL_PRTFL_ASSGNMNT_ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN_FNNCL_ASSTS_ASSGNMNT_IL.ACCMLTD_WRTFFS
        ELSE N/A
      END;

SET BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_EIL.ACCMLTD_TTL_WRTFFS = 
      CASE
        WHEN BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_EIL.GRSS_CRRYNG_AMNT = 0 AND BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_IL.CRRYNG_AMNT = 0 THEN BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_IL.ACCMLTD_WRTFFS
        ELSE N/A
      END;

SET BIRD_LNG_SCRTY_PSTN_PRDNTL_PRTFL_ASSGNMNT_ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN_FNNCL_ASSTS_ASSGNMNT_EIL.ACCMLTD_TTL_WRTFFS = 
      CASE
        WHEN BIRD_LNG_SCRTY_PSTN_PRDNTL_PRTFL_ASSGNMNT_ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN_FNNCL_ASSTS_ASSGNMNT_EIL.GRSS_CRRYNG_AMNT = 0 AND BIRD_LNG_SCRTY_PSTN_PRDNTL_PRTFL_ASSGNMNT_ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN_FNNCL_ASSTS_ASSGNMNT_IL.CRRYNG_AMNT = 0 THEN BIRD_LNG_SCRTY_PSTN_PRDNTL_PRTFL_ASSGNMNT_ACCNTNG_CLSSFCTN_FNNCL_ASSTS_ASSGNMNT_IL.ACCMLTD_WRTFFS
        ELSE N/A
      END;
